name: Town Racer - 3D Car Racing
description:
The best iOS arcade racing game. Buckle up and get ready for some serious racing action. Drive and weave thru traffic, earn cash, upgrade your ride and buy new racing cars! Compete with friends or other racers from around the world in the global leaderboards.

GAME FEATURES:
- BEST Curved Roads to Race In
- STUNNING Graphics and Environments
- ADDICTIVE Endless Gameplay
- RACE Multiple Sports Cars
- UPGRADE your Engine, Braking and Handling

How far will you go in this awesome endless street racing game?
